import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update Sync Config</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/sync_configs/{sync_config_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



:::danger
If `force_delete_syncs` is set to true, any syncs for any deleted objects will be cascadingly deleted for all customers with this sync config.
:::


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 Configuration options for "how" to sync.

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"period_ms"} required={true} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 60000`"} schema={{"type":"integer","minimum":60000,"example":60000,"description":"The period (in milliseconds) to run the sync."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"strategy"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`full then incremental`, `full only`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["full then incremental","full only"],"description":"\\\"full then incremental\\\" will run a full sync on the first run, then incremental syncs. \\\"full only\\\" will run a full sync on every run."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"auto_start_on_connection"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, the sync will start automatically when the connection is created.\nDefault: true\n"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"full_sync_every_n_incrementals"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"If set, Supaglue will run a full sync after N consecutive incremental syncs."}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>common_objects</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

A list of Supaglue objects to be synced.

</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"object"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The Supaglue object name","example":"contact"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>sync_strategy_override</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Configuration options for "how" to sync.

schema={{"type":"integer","minimum":60000,"example":60000,"description":"The period (in milliseconds) to run the sync."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"strategy"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`full then incremental`, `full only`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["full then incremental","full only"],"description":"\\\"full then incremental\\\" will run a full sync on the first run, then incremental syncs. \\\"full only\\\" will run a full sync on every run."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"auto_start_on_connection"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, the sync will start automatically when the connection is created.\nDefault: true\n"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"full_sync_every_n_incrementals"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"If set, Supaglue will run a full sync after N consecutive incremental syncs."}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"associations_to_fetch"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"A list of associated objects to fetch when syncing this object. \nIf empty or unspecified, no associations will be fetched.\nOnly relevant for Hubspot.\n","items":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the associated object to fetch","example":"account"}}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem
